timeline.title: Terminal Developer
timeline.description: Joined Warp to work on revolutionizing the terminal experience for developers. Focusing on performance, UX, and innovative features.
highlights: Contributed to the Rust-based terminal core
Implemented new command-line features for improved productivity
Enhanced cross-platform compatibility and responsiveness

timeline.title: Senior Rust Developer
timeline.description: Led development of CLI and TUI applications for system monitoring and automation. Improved performance and user experience through Rust optimizations.
highlights: Reduced memory usage by 40% through custom data structures
Implemented cross-platform terminal rendering with Ratatui
Mentored 4 junior developers in Rust best practices

timeline.title: Rust Programming: Advanced Concepts
timeline.description: Completed in-depth course on advanced Rust programming techniques, focusing on performance optimization and systems programming.
highlights: Mastered advanced concepts like lifetimes and borrowing
Built high-performance concurrent applications
Explored FFI and interop with other languages

timeline.title: Frontend Team Lead
timeline.description: Managed a team of 6 developers building modern web applications with TypeScript and React. Established coding standards and review processes.
highlights: Delivered major dashboard redesign project ahead of schedule
Reduced bundle size by 35% through code splitting and lazy loading
Implemented comprehensive UI testing strategy

timeline.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
timeline.description: Earned professional certification for designing distributed systems on AWS, focusing on scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness.
highlights: Designed high-availability architectures
Implemented secure and compliant cloud solutions
Optimized infrastructure for performance and cost

timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: Developed and maintained web applications using Node.js backend and React frontend. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and testing frameworks.
highlights: Built RESTful API service that handled 500k+ daily requests
Improved application load time by 60% through optimizations
Introduced GraphQL for more efficient data fetching

timeline.title: M.S. Computer Science
timeline.description: Completed part-time Master's degree focusing on distributed systems and cloud computing while working full-time.
highlights: Thesis on efficient data synchronization in distributed systems
Research assistant in cloud computing lab
Published paper on cloud-native applications

timeline.title: Software Engineer
timeline.description: Worked on various projects including mobile apps and web services. Focused on responsive design and cross-platform compatibility.
highlights: Developed iOS and Android apps using React Native
Implemented PWA features for offline functionality
Created API integrations with third-party services

timeline.title: B.S. Computer Science
timeline.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on software engineering and web technologies with a minor in Mathematics.
highlights: Senior project: Open-source code editor extension
Teaching assistant for Algorithms course
President of Coding Club

timeline.title: Junior Developer
timeline.description: Started career building websites and small web applications. Gained experience with frontend and backend technologies.
highlights: Built and maintained company website
Developed custom CMS solution for small businesses
Created responsive email templates
